mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECTID, A.PROJECTNAME, A.CHATROOMNAME, A.CHATROOMID, A.ROOMPASSWORD FROM CHATROOM A INNER JOIN PROJECT_LOOKUP B ON A.PROJECTID = B.PROJECT_ID WHERE B.MEMBER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_CONTENT, CHATROOM_ID,MESSAGE_SENDTIME) VALUES( #{message_sender}, #{message_content}, #{chatroom_id}, #{message_sendTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_ID = #{chatroom_id} ORDER BY MESSAGE_SENDTIME
SELECT PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME FROM PROJECTDIR INNER JOIN (SELECT PROJECT_ID FROM PROJECT_LOOKUP WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{myId}) USING (PROJECT_ID)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATROOM (ROOMPASSWORD, PROJECTID, PROJECTNAME, CHATROOMNAME, CHATROOMID) VALUES( #{roomPassword}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{chatRoomName}, (select nvl(max(CHATROOMID), 0)+1 from CHATROOM))
